title: SQLUNION Keyword

metadata.description: Learn about SQLUNION Keyword with clear explanations and practical examples.

content_sections.title: Details
content_sections.content:
Reference

❯
UNION
The
UNION
command combines the result set of two or more SELECT statements (only 
distinct values)
The following SQL statement returns the cities 
(only distinct values) from both the "Customers" and the "Suppliers" table:
Example
SELECT City FROM Customers
UNION
SELECT City FROM Suppliers
ORDER BY City;

Reference

❯
★
+1

content_sections.title: Example
content_sections.code:
SELECT City FROM Customers
UNION
SELECT City FROM Suppliers
ORDER BY City;

summary: This tutorial covers SQLUNION Keyword concepts and techniques. You'll learn how to use SQLUNION Keyword effectively, including key principles, common patterns, and practical examples. By the end of this tutorial, you'll have a solid understanding of SQLUNION Keyword and how to apply it in your projects.
